content: A great About Us page helps builds trust between you and your customers. The more content you provide about you and your business, the more confident people will be when purchasing from your store.
Your About Us page might include:
Your About Us page might include:

blocks.content: Why you sell the items you sell
How long you have been in business
How long you have been running your online shop
Who are the people on your team

content: To edit the content on this page, go to the Pages section of your Shopify admin.
